member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateMonitor.GetSupportedStates
member.summary: Gets the occlusion states supported by the current device.
member.returns: A DWORD containing a bitwise OR combination of values from the enumeration.

member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateMonitor.Start
member.summary: Starts the camera occlusion state monitor.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value, including but not limited to the following values:

member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateMonitor.Stop
member.summary: Stops the camera occlusion state monitor.

returns.para: Returns an HRESULT value, including but not limited to the following values:

member.name: IMFCameraOcclusionStateMonitor
member.summary: Monitors the occlusion state of a camera device.
